items.title: Apple’s new App Review Guidelines clamp down on apps sharing personal data with ‘third-party AI’
items.description: Apple updates its App Store rules to restrict apps from sharing personal data with third-party AI without disclosure and explicit permission.

items.title: Uber quietly pilots in-app video recording for drivers in India

items.title: Newsletter platform beehiiv adds AI website building, creator tools in major expansion
items.description: Newsletter platform beehiiv announced a massive expansion to its platform on Thursday, including offering real-time analytics and AI website creation.
